skill.name: log-analyzer
skill.description: Parse and analyze application logs to identify errors, patterns, and insights.
skill.summary: Parse and analyze application logs to identify errors, patterns, and insights.
skill.author: CuriousLearner

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill with no executable code, network access, or file system operations. It only provides instructions for AI to analyze logs provided by users.

content.user_title: Analyze Logs to Find Errors and Patterns
content.value_statement: Log analysis is time-consuming and error-prone when done manually. This skill automatically parses logs, identifies patterns, and provides actionable insights.
actual_capabilities: Parse multiple log formats (JSON, syslog, Apache, custom)
Provide root cause analysis and recommendations
limitations: Requires logs to be provided as text input
Cannot directly access log files on systems
Analysis quality depends on log format consistency
Limited to patterns visible in provided log samples

use_cases.title: Production Incident Analysis
use_cases.description: Quickly identify root causes during outages by analyzing error spikes and correlating events across services.

use_cases.title: Application Debugging
use_cases.description: Parse application logs to find bugs, track error frequencies, and understand user-reported issues.

use_cases.title: System Health Monitoring
use_cases.description: Analyze system logs to detect performance degradation, security issues, and resource problems.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Log Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze these application logs and identify all errors, their frequency, and patterns: [paste logs here]

prompt_templates.title: Performance Analysis
prompt_templates.scenario: Find slow queries and performance issues
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze these logs for performance issues, slow queries, and response time patterns: [paste logs here]

prompt_templates.title: Error Pattern Detection
prompt_templates.prompt: Find patterns in these error logs including timing, frequency, and correlation between different error types: [paste logs here]

prompt_templates.title: Incident Timeline
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a timeline of events from these logs showing how the incident progressed, including error escalation and recovery: [paste logs here]

output_examples.input: Analyze my web server logs for errors in the last hour
output: Found 23 errors in the last hour
Top error: 404 Not Found (15 occurrences) - Missing /api/users endpoint
Database connection errors: 5 - Connection pool exhausted at 14:32
Critical: Memory usage warnings in worker service (3 occurrences)
Recommendation: Increase database connection pool from 10 to 25 connections

best_practices: Provide logs in chronological order for accurate timeline analysis
Include timestamps in a consistent format when possible
Specify the time range or context for more targeted analysis
anti_patterns: Don't paste logs with sensitive data like passwords or API keys
Avoid truncating logs mid-error as it breaks pattern detection
Don't mix logs from different services without clear separation

faq.question: What log formats are supported?
faq.answer: JSON, syslog, Apache/Nginx combined format, and most common application log formats with timestamps.

faq.question: How much log data can I analyze?
faq.answer: You can analyze thousands of log lines. For very large files, focus on specific time ranges or error types.

faq.question: Can it connect to my logging system?
faq.answer: No, you need to copy and paste the logs. The skill cannot directly access files or network services.

faq.question: Is my log data secure?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill only processes the text you provide. It doesn't store or transmit your data elsewhere.

faq.question: Why isn't it finding the errors I see?
faq.answer: Ensure logs are complete and include error keywords. Try specifying the error pattern you're looking for.

faq.question: How is this different from grep?
faq.answer: This skill understands log context, finds patterns, correlates events, and provides actionable insights beyond simple text matching.
